```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(hrbrthemes)

```

```{r}
fest <- read.csv("panorama-des-festivals.csv", encoding = "UTF-8", sep = ";") 
 
fest <- fest %>% 
   count(Région, Domaine, name = "nbr") %>% 
   mutate(Domaine = str_to_lower(Domaine))
 
   ggplot(fest, aes(fill=Domaine, y=nbr, x=Région)) + 
     geom_bar(position="stack", stat="identity") +
     coord_flip() +
     labs(x ="Région", y = "Nombre de festival", title ="Nombre de festivals par domaine et par région")
```
